column1: MRI image size (128, 256, 1) in weighting T2, presenting the head of a man of 37 years old, of sagittal section. The observation is made on slice n°144 from the right hemisphere of the skull. The section reveals the presence of: the brainstem of volume 142.3828 mm³, the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 5245.7520 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 4384.8633 mm³, the right lateral ventricle of volume 266.3086 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 572.1680 mm³, the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1645.3125 mm³, the right thalamus proper of volume 432.4219 mm³, the right caudate nucleus of volume 324.3164 mm³, the right putamen of volume 79.1016 mm³, the right globus pallidus of volume 89.6484 mm³, the right hippocampus of volume 63.2812 mm³, the right amygdala of volume 71.1914 mm³ and the right ventral diencephalon of volume 137.1094 mm³.
